source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_SEQ_00<tab>Hervoix is loath to start his new assignments.

TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_SEQ_01<tab>Hervoix has been worrying over the list of tasks given to him by O'bhen Tia, unsure of which one to procrastinate on doing first. Eventually he decides to take care of the beasts that have been stalking the forest to the east. Or rather, he decides to have <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> take care of them. Head to the eastern camp and speak with Guenaret for any information regarding your targets' whereabouts.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_SEQ_01<tab>O'bhen Tia hat Hervoix mit der Beseitigung einer unbekannten Spezies von Monstern beauftragt. Hervoix ist froh, dich mit der Aufgabe betrauen zu dürfen. Sprich mit Guenaret im Camp im Osten des Chocobo-Waldes, um mehr über die Monster in Erfahrung zu bringen.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_SEQ_02<tab>After speaking to Guenaret about the oversized arachnids, you learn that O'bhen Tia himself demanded that Guenaret wait until someone was sent to settle the problem. Although <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> were not actually the one meant to do the job, Guenaret seems eager to be rid of the menace. Go north and search for any signs of the beasts, which are said to resemble giant spiders.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_SEQ_02<tab>Guenaret hat dir erzählt, im Osten des Camps riesige spinnenartige Monster gesehen zu haben. Finde die Monster und besiege sie.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_SEQ_03<tab>The monsters will no longer pose a danger to the forest's chocobos or hunters. Report your success to Hervoix at Tailfeather to receive your reward, hopefully this time in a timely manner.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_SEQ_03<tab>Du hast die Monster besiegt. Erstatte nun Hervoix Bericht.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_SEQ_04<tab>You relay the story of your errand to Hervoix, and he seems to be slighted by the fact that O'bhen Tia would dare entrust him with such dangerous work. With his chief's intentions still a mystery, he gives you your reward and begrudgingly returns to his list of tasks.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_SEQ_04<tab>Hervoix ist empört, dass sein Vorgesetzter ihn mit der Beseitigung solch ekliger Monster beauftragt hat. Er verdächtigt ihn, ihm die Aufgabe aus reiner Schikane gegeben zu haben.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_TODO_01<tab>Slay the monsters near the Hissing Cobbles.
TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_000<tab>I suppose I should at least <var 1A 02 /var>look<var 1A 01 /var> at the chief's requests... Which job should I do...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_000<tab><seufz> Dann will ich mal einen Blick auf die lästige Aufgabenliste werfen. Was darf ich denn dieses Mal Schönes machen?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_001<tab>“Some unseemly beasts have been sighted near the camp to the east. Slay them before any chocobos, or chocobo hunters, come to harm.”
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_001<tab>„In der Nähe eines Chocobo-Camps östlich von hier wurde eine unbekannte Spezies von Monstern gesichtet. Erledige sie, bevor sie sich zu einem ernsthaften Problem entwickeln.“

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_002<tab>Godsdammit, he means to make me slaughter <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> mindless brutes? How're we supposed to make a living if we're not out hunting? Say...this type of job might befit a certain adventurer I know...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_002<tab><seufz> Schon wieder eine Aufgabe, die nichts mit der Chocobo-Jagd zu tun hat! Ich bin <var 1A 02 /var>Chocobo<var 1A 01 /var>-Jäger, nicht Monsterjäger! Abenteurer erledigen Monster! ... Hm ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_003<tab>How does a jaunt into the forest for some monster killing sound? Of course, more gil awaits you upon completion.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_003<tab>Abenteurer<var 08 E905 ((in)) (()) /var>, ich bitte dich! Erledige für mich die Monster!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_004<tab>Splendid! As you likely already know, a hunter's camp lies to the east of here. Ask Guenaret for any information about the beasts terrorizing the chocobos.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_004<tab>Das Camp befindet sich in östlicher Richtung von hier. Genaueres erfährst du von einem der Jäger vor Ort, sein Name ist Guenaret. Hals- und Beinbruch!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_013<tab>The camp is just to the east of here. Ask Guenaret what he knows of these alleged beasts.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_013<tab>Das Camp befindet sich in östlicher Richtung von hier. Hals- und Beinbruch!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_GUENARET_000_010<tab>You're here lookin' for those maddenin' beasts too? Ain't never seen a thing like them in these woods. Seems they're lurkin' about to the north of here.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_GUENARET_000_010<tab>Eine unbekannte Spezies von Monstern? Damit meinst du sicher die riesigen spinnenartigen Monster, auf die ich im Norden gestoßen bin.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_GUENARET_000_011<tab>I had a mind to take care of them myself, but O'bhen Tia was awful insistent that I stay put, said he'd be sendin' someone over to do it. I reckon that's you? Well, as long as it gets done one way or the other, I suppose I've no right to complain.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_GUENARET_000_011<tab>Ich hätte sie ja selbst erledigt, wenn mich nicht O'bhen daran gehindert hätte. „Finger weg! Diese Aufgabe überlässt du schön Hervoix“, hat er gemeint. Schon seltsam, oder?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_GUENARET_000_020<tab>Ain't never seen the likes of those beasts in this forest before. Head north if you're planning on lookin' for them.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_GUENARET_000_020<tab>Den spinnenartigen Monstern bin ich im Norden begegnet.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_030<tab>Ah, you're back quicker than I expected. Now, tell me all about your exciting hunt!

TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_031<tab>D-Diremites, you say!? Thank heavens for you, adventurer, as I have a terrible phobia of anything with more than four legs. But, if what Guenaret said was true...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_031<tab>Riesige spinnenartige Monster? Igitt, das hört sich ja widerlich an! Und O'bhen wollte ausdrücklich, dass <var 1A 02 /var>ich<var 1A 01 /var> diese ekligen Dinger erledige? Das ist ...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_032<tab>Why would the chief put such dangerous work on <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> shoulders? I could've been injured, or worse...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_032<tab>... Schikane! Jawohl, reine Schikane ist das!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_033<tab>Hmmm, I suppose it's best not to dwell on such matters for now. Once again, you have proven your excellence at killing. Your reward is well deserved!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ719_01923_HERVOIX_000_033<tab>Wie gut, dass du zufällig da warst und mir diese eklige Aufgabe abgenommen hast! Hier hast du deine Belohnung!
